extraction_metadata.notes: This is a particularly tragic case involving an 11-year-old boy executed for witchcraft. His father had been executed as a witch 3 years earlier. The boy was destitute and begging for bread. The confession describes sabbat attendance as a young child with his father. No torture was used. The Change de Nancy approved the execution despite his young age. Catherine femme Didier Jean Charpentier was confronted with him while in prison.
